dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach the mighty Infernal Watcher. What foolishness brings you here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Ha! You are a mere mortal. What can you possibly offer me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a deal. You help me, and I'll pave the way for your dominion.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A deal, you say? Intriguing. Speak your terms, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Swear loyalty to me, and I shall grant you power beyond your wildest dreams.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power beyond my wildest dreams... Very well. I shall consider your offer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my insolence. I shall take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should. Begone before my patience runs out.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek your guidance to unlock ancient secrets and unleash chaos upon my foes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Chaos... I can appreciate that. But why should I aid you in such endeavors?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we can sow destruction and watch the world burn.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An enticing proposition. Very well, mortal. I shall assist you.
Foolish mortal. You shall regret underestimating the Infernal Watcher.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no need for your approval. Prepare for battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such bravado from a mere mortal. You shall regret crossing paths with me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You may be powerful, but I fear no one. Let's settle this now!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words. Let's see if you can back them up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see now that wisdom is in avoiding unnecessary conflict. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise decision, mortal. Take your leave before I change my mind.
